backend/main.mo: Main canister logic defining comments, rating images, messages, device‑scoped user history, access control, and bulk generator key management with storage mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old single-level user comment history into new per-device nested history format.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented device‑scoped history features, related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten short summaries for various frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based style sheet defining OKLCH color variables and dark mode overrides.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application managing view modes, admin PIN unlock, layout, and global UI providers.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Component showing an access-denied card for unauthorized admin panel access.
Modal prompting users for the bulk generator access key with validation and loading states.
frontend/src/components/AdminChatPanel.t: Admin chat interface that loads, displays, sorts, and replies to user messages with unread indicators and auto-scrolling.
frontend/src/components/AdminDetailsCard: Static card showing admin profile details such as name, contact, progression, and payment time.
frontend/src/components/AdminPinDialog.t: Dialog for validating a 4-digit admin access code with input handling, error states, and success callbacks.
frontend/src/components/AnimatedBackgrou: Canvas-based animated background rendering moving particles and floating icons with color effects.
frontend/src/components/BulkGeneratorKey: UI for viewing, setting, and resetting the bulk generator access key with masked display and confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/components/ChatBox.tsx: User chat widget that toggles open, displays messages, handles sending, and syncs with authentication state.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer displaying branding, credits, and production version info.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header component showing app title, theme toggle, and logout handling tied to Internet Identity and React Query.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on identity, initializing admin access and invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeviceId.ts: Provides a stable device ID loaded from localStorage via getDeviceId.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeviceScopedGenera: Mutation hook generating a comment scoped to a device, updating local history and invalidating relevant queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeviceScopedUserCo: Fetches device-scoped comment history with backend reconciliation and localStorage seeding for offline behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, login/clear functions, and identity persistence using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for admin checks, comment lists, counts, bulk generation, and key management.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with light/dark theme variables and custom gradient, glow, and animation utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanel.tsx: Admin interface for managing comment lists, adding comments (single or bulk), handling rating images, and viewing bulk statistics.
frontend/src/pages/UploadSection.tsx: UI for users to upload images, add comments, and generate bulk comments with access-key validation.
frontend/src/pages/UserView.tsx: End‑user view for generating single or bulk comments, checking remaining counts, uploading images, and viewing device-scoped history.
frontend/src/utils/adminPinSession.ts: Exports the static admin access code used for backend‑compatible admin operations.
Utilities for loading, saving, updating, and clearing device‑scoped comment generation history in localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/deviceId.ts: Generates, retrieves, and clears a persistent per-device identifier stored in localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash‑based parameter cleanup.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, animations, container settings, and theme utilities for the frontend.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s overall state, including versioning, architectural notes of the ICP backend and React frontend, and known issues with comment randomness, validation gaps, and deployment inconsistencies.
